title: Commonsense behind the wheel
brief_description: The film opens with a casualty case in a hospital after a traffic accident. Rules for safe driving are enumerated and explained with practical demonstrations. Shows the need for correct hand signals and also the disastrous effects of driving whilst under the influence of alcohol.
